meanings.definition: Having a single set of chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: The monoploid cell contained only one set of chromosomes.
meanings.sent2: The monoploid organism had a unique genetic makeup.
meanings.sent3: The monoploid fruit fly decided to start a solo band with its single set of chromosomes.
meanings.sent4: Her monoploid nature made her stand out like a lone star in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The monoploid flower bloomed brightly with its single set of chromosomes.
